data.message: When are y'all going to do the dislike button??? Billions are awaiting the answer!!

replies.message: Hi Wendy. People come to Facebook to share updates that are happy, sad, funny, painful, and thought-provoking. We’ve heard feedback that people would like more ways to express how they feel, which is why we've created Reactions. This feature makes expressing how you feel about the things you see on Facebook easier than ever. -Kate
You did not answer the question Kate.  Allow me propose the same question a little differently... "Can you add a dislike button to Reactions?"
Facebook is still not directly answering that question!!!
When does it hit our messages? When can we start using this app?

Wendy if you don't like something then just don't hit the like button. I think this is what's wrong with the world now. Everybody wants to be mean. How nice. Facebook can you create a dislike button really quick so I can dislike Wendy's comment💯
